website_summaries.verdict: A premium single ingredient casein protein powder with zero hidden additives, or preservatives. A great choice for anyone committed to clean eating.
pros: Pure micellar casein provides a steady release of branched chain amino acids to help boost recovery and prevent muscle breakdown
Cold pressed to preserve quality and purity
10 grams of BCAAS, L-Glutamine and precursors per serving
cons: Scattered complaints over general taste and potability when mixed

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at full price...
customer_reviews.text: I was an avid used of the "Platinum Casein: Vanilla Ice Cream" Muscletech product. Based on the information I received from a Muscletech representative, that product has been replaced with this one. This product definitely does the job however it doesn't do it any better than the previous product, or products similar to it that are cheaper. In addition, I bought the Platinum because it tasted great and it broke down really well. This product does not accomplish those two key features well. I probably won't be investing in this product again unless it's on sale. tl;dr Does the same job as other proteins but taste and break down are off the mark from the product it's replacing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting taste and poor mixability - Going back to the green lidded competitor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was cheaper now that the price of my usual went up. I'm going back to the now more expensive one after I forcefeed this down my gullet. There is a chemical taste and the mixability is nonexistent. You're definitely going to need an electric mixer because a shaker bottle isn't going to cut it. I don't know who the heck the "American Masters of Taste" are, but I'm not going to take any of their recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: husbandandwife

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting protein
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the worst tasting protein I’ve ever bought. Only by mixing in some extra flavors and sugar am I able to make this stuff edible, and even then, it’s pretty bad. I’m just trying to get rid of it so I never have to taste it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D Welch

customer_reviews.title: Great product, low carbs & sugar.
customer_reviews.text: I take this at night before sleep as a snack, it lowers my sugar in the AM (Diabetic). Before Casein Gold, I would eat a nigh time munchies, which elevated my sugar. Another plus, no more sore muscles after work outs and I don't get hungry. Great taste also. Great protein for muscle regeneration.
customer_reviews.author: D.A

customer_reviews.title: Got both vanilla and chocolate 2. 5LB containers on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got both vanilla and chocolate 2.5LB containers on a recommendation from a friend who said the casein protein tends to help keep you fuller longer. I honestly don’t know that is the case for me vs traditional whey protein. The taste is OK with water but nothing extrodinary. I’ll probably try something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Good product, and Muscletech is a great company. But the flavor profile leaves lots to be desired and it doesn't mix easily. It reminds of the protein powders from the mid-90s and early 2000s that were clumpy and chalky. I wouldn't avoid it, but Mutant's casein powder blows it away by a landslide.
customer_reviews.author: Chubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really liking this product. Especially for after sports i play late at night, or taking it before bed when i know i have a heavy lift day the next morning. The flavor is great. I love chocolate, and this has a great taste. I mix with water, and that seems to taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: SO FLUFFY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this protein to make "pudding" out of. Yes, it is a little clumpy but nothing a blender cant fix, I usually just mix it with a spoon and a bit of water and it fluffs up just like pudding. You can add flavoring or leave it alone, its not overly sweet and for the price and what you get, it is not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is thick ! have to mix with double the liquid amount, or it's like cold gravy ! Taste isn't good either !
customer_reviews.author: Jake M.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is decent, price is good, mixes thick like all casein but in general this is now my go-to and on my subscribe and save list. Toss in a bit of water, ice cubes, a few berries and it makes a great smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Caragol

customer_reviews.title: Actually pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Tastes better than expected. And if you want it as a treat, use cold milk to mix and then set in the fridge in a bowl for a more pudding consistency
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT like whey. Something a lot of people don't seem to realize...
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the bad reviews here seem to be from people who don't know what casein is and just assume this sucks. Casein will never be as "thin" as whey but i mix it 75% casein 25% whey with a bit of creatine and it mixes great and not too thick. For post workout i do the opposite ratio and I've gotten good results, and it does great for the appetite. Only 4 stars because it's the only caesin i ever tried so i have no basis for comparison. Maybe I'll bump to 5 later.
customer_reviews.author: great deal for the price

customer_reviews.title: Casein Gold
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every night before bedtime. I wake up feeling full and energized. What I like about this product is that it’s slow digesting and ready for the morning. I’ve noticed a slight increase in strength. I really love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Banda

customer_reviews.title: Get any flavor but vanilla
customer_reviews.text: A fan of Casein Gold for years. Cookies n cream is delicious. Chocolate Supreme is great for fans of chocolate fudge flavor. Vanilla on the other hand is disgusting. Artificial sweetener aftertaste. Has that fake vanilla flavor instead of a usual vanilla bean taste you would hope for.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dewey

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is on point
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of it and this is my first time using supplements in my entire life. This is actually working so well for me i can see my body shape is slowly changing and i’m slowly bulking up i was never able to gain any weight ever since i was a kid as y’all know abt hard gainer but this is working for me so far
customer_reviews.author: Van Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mixer
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the muscle tech ripped or power which I absolutely love. I decided to try this one for the first time. Mixed it with 8Oz of almond milk as I’ve always done. Immediately turned into a very thick moose like shake. It’s so thick that it won’t even come out of the shaker bottle. Almost like pudding. Will be returning and going back to my regular power or ripped muscle tech
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Medina

customer_reviews.title: Strange Smell and Taste
customer_reviews.text: Immediately upon opening this product had a very strong smell that reminded me of rubbing alcohol or some kind of cleaning product. It's very unpleasant and overpowering, to the point where you can't taste anything else. I'm disappointed because the nutrition profile is decent. I've never had this problem with other brands of casein.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for very long time. Very effective, slow digestive .
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate good
customer_reviews.text: Thick formula sticky tastes ok I make them into smoothies with ice and add a banana actually tastes better and keeps me full for a long time, I took this after arm and core workout yesterday and this morning helped out less soreness
customer_reviews.author: Dmartinez2224

customer_reviews.title: Very bad taste
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different muscletech products in the past but this one has a very bad taste to it. If you are thinking this product will taste similar to other muscletech protein products you will be very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MRJ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste of the protein powder was great. So was the value!
customer_reviews.author: Lynise Oseland

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrrrrate!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One word........ Delicious. Been taking this product for awhile and I love. Low calorie and 24 grams of slow burning casein protein. It’s fantastic. If you’ve never tried casein, it’s a lot different then whey. Much thicker when mixed. But for a slow burning protein before bed, this is definitely the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read the label on the back!
customer_reviews.text: Very good tasting but beware of label. This is not a pure Casein protein as you thought it would be by the front label. Deceptive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible, I’ve tried many brands & this is a model power. Mixes nice, good powder consistency, thick after you mix!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I loved how smoothly this mixed with no clumping! Great flavor also!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Carty

customer_reviews.title: Protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: Does not mix well. It is very clumpy. The flavor is not as good I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest dorson

customer_reviews.title: Great product-Muscletech
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this powder for over a year. It dissolves well with water and actually tastes like real chocolate! I feel the boost when I tAke it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flavor and it's easy to mix either shaking with your hands or even a blender! Try to mix in using a blender: 300ml of water + 3 ice cubs + 1 scoop = delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Raphael N.

customer_reviews.title: taste was very good and helped up my protein for the day
customer_reviews.text: taste was very good and helped up my protein for the day...a little hard to stir in but a blender/bullet was be a huge help.
customer_reviews.author: M. LOYD

customer_reviews.title: Good protein.
customer_reviews.text: Good protein. It’s still like most other Casin and doesn’t mix as well as whey.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Trent Inman

customer_reviews.title: Missing the Muscletech stamp on the top
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know where is the Muscletech stamp on top !!! And it doesn’t look like always to me , i didn’t try it but i did returned , i don’t wanna risk my health ,
customer_reviews.author: Mouheb

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Taste and price! 30% off coupon helps. $37 for 70 + servings.
customer_reviews.author: Iron11

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate flavor is super delicious. It's something special, as I like it, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Elizondo Mora

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein
customer_reviews.text: Casein protein is great for that slow breakdown of proteins and MT made this one taste delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome protein it tasted great I mixed it with a frozen banana so yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and mixes well
customer_reviews.text: I like this protein powder. It tastes good and mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed as I have been using their other product, the taste is off and is very chalky and does not mix well.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Man worst taste, way to thick, and it says it’s not gritty but it is. Wouldn’t ever buy it again. Nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Liesl DeField

customer_reviews.title: but it truly tastes so bad that I have to choke it down as fast ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading positive reviews, but it truly tastes so bad that I have to choke it down as fast as I can and try not to vomit. Really disapointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Has a strange taste to it. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: Awful solubility
customer_reviews.text: If you prefer drinking powder chunk porridge then get this. The solubility is so bad that it is not unfair to describe it as “hydrophobic”.
customer_reviews.author: Zhenhuan Sun

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, mixes well when you add water, a little thick with milk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t mix well.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not mix well and has borderline taste.
customer_reviews.author: Branden H.

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla flavor is incredibly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the cookies and cream version; the vanilla is hard to choke down. Tastes like the plastic bottle it was shipped in!
customer_reviews.author: Luanna Hacker

customer_reviews.title: I like the protein powder.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ran over the box. Needless to say it exploited and powder went everywhere. LOL ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W. Melton

customer_reviews.title: Thickness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Real buyer. This stuff tastes great and mixes great with water. If you like a thick protein shake this is for you. I drink every night before bed. Def buying again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't mix great but taste aint bad. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Gritty bad taste
customer_reviews.text: Horrible taste and very gritty. Would like to return it!
customer_reviews.author: jenelle

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this has been the worst tasting shake I've ever purchased or tried...wouldn't recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: joseph

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: don't like the taste and as far as muscle gain I got none
customer_reviews.author: frod

customer_reviews.title: Good value but the vanilla taste is .... meh.
customer_reviews.text: I should've spent the extra $2 and got the chocolate flavor. I firmly believe chocolate is the only reliable flavor when it comes to protein powder. The vanilla flavor of this is, well, not good. It is palatable, but not in any way good. On the plus side, it does mix well in a shaker cup. It is SUPER thick -- I use about twice the recommended water and its still thick. Too thick to drink at the recommended ratio for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I think the flavor of this protein is honestly really good. It’s definitely thicker than their whey proteins, but it tastes good and it mixed fine for me in a shaker with almond milk. I got the chocolate, and it’s a mild chocolate flavor, thick - tastes like a milkshake kind of! I like to mix it with chia seeds and almond milk and let it sit for 45 minutes to turn into a chia seed pudding. Top it with honey and coconut flakes, and it's a delicious snack!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mix taste is bad but it works
customer_reviews.text: OK so the taste the first few days is really bad, like just medical tasting bad. However you will adjust and I did in about 5 days. Taste is not great but acceptable and the results are fantastic. Casein makes me have wild dreams so I know this stuff is good, I have bananas dreams after I take this before bed. Helps me recover and train every day, no soreness the next day and helps me maintain muscle mass after a long nights sleep. Easy to mix in water.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Great price...
customer_reviews.text: I consume alot of protein, This has been a staple late afternoon & before bed for decades! ONLY get vanilla so you can mix with anything.....
customer_reviews.author: John Morrisette

customer_reviews.title: As tasty as any Casein protein will ever be!
customer_reviews.text: It's not easy finding a good casein or casein blend protein that taste as good as whey. This one is as close as you'll get. I had been dong Phase8 Milk Chocolate for a while, but will definitely be getting this again. It's still thick, as any slow digesting protein should be, but it's not bad. I no longer have to dread taking my night-time protein on workout days!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lorenty

customer_reviews.title: Best Casein out there
customer_reviews.text: This casein is the best I have tried by far. Mixes with water perfectly, no clumping. The flavor is good, there is no chalky taste with it. My body digested it really nice as well, didn't upset my stomach at all
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lantzy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed...doesn't mix well , even after sitting a few minutes and re shaken. The flavor is bland and some gas is to be expected when switching powders but good lord...
customer_reviews.author: Joel Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great taste..Less filling...LOL
customer_reviews.text: The taste increases and turns deliciously creamy made a day in advance and given a chance to chill overnight...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I felt the difference taking it before bed and my muscles feeling good the next morning. It taste good but it's sticky in the glass , I just started putting it in a glass and using a spoon to mix it , but it's worth it. Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Karl P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the best value for flavored Casein on Amazon. Taste is good, not great. But it is also lower in calories than many of the competing products--which probably accounts for the taste. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: GDEC

customer_reviews.title: Funny Taste
customer_reviews.text: At some point, the manufacturer has changed the formula. In the past, it was a reasonably nice vanilla flavor, perhaps a touch sweet, but very drinkable. However, the new reformulated flavor has a sharp, almost chemical, taste. I don't find it pleasant. I'll struggle to finish the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey West

customer_reviews.title: Just eat the powder
customer_reviews.text: I really disliked the mixing of the product.No matter how much I used the shaker cup or blender,it was so thick or clumpy that most of it didn't even blend properly
customer_reviews.author: Carter Vincensse

customer_reviews.title: One of the casein for quality and price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great casein protein, excellent taste, easy to mix and a awesome value. Besides ON Casein this is your best bet. You won’t be disappointed at all
customer_reviews.author: Brooks B.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, not chalky!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than most others. Tastes great, without the chalky texture. I use their when protein as well, and that is the best I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Don D

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor. Mixes well.
customer_reviews.text: Mixes well with water or milk. Good flavor. I plan to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_fan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, great taste at a more than fair price!
customer_reviews.author: Patriotsnjz

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but extremely thick. I only use one scoop before bed. I use my Nitro Tech Whey for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Taste is great, on point with either milk or water
customer_reviews.text: Taste is great, on point with either milk or water, however I recommend using water as it gets absurdly thick with milk or almond milk.
customer_reviews.author: matthew blake

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it unless you don’t care about taste or how poorly it mixes
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like garbage and clumps worse than any Casein powder I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: A.J’s

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This has a good flavor to it. Had to get use to at first, but it's really good.
customer_reviews.author: craig a. smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Quite thick, milk-shake like, but all casein protein powders are thick. Tastes fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zaleski

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fluffy plus I ordered Chocolate Supreme but got Creamy Vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Firedragon

customer_reviews.title: Best casein protein
customer_reviews.text: Decent taste, mixes easily. NitroTech, so it’s top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Morfyus

customer_reviews.title: A Qualty Protein
customer_reviews.text: Quality protein. Mixes well in Shaker cups and blends well
customer_reviews.author: Charles "Grill Guy"

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the taste and it delivers serious results!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: MuscleTech NitroTech Casein Gold Protein Powder, Sustained-Release Micellar Casein, Chocolate Supreme, 80.32 oz
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate| Size:5.02 Pound (Pack of 1)Nitro Tech has led the way in whey protein innovation. And now new Nitro Tech Casein Gold is here! This advanced protein powder features multiple premium casein protein sources for optimal digestion rate and superior BCAAs profile! Casein protein and milk protein are some of the slowest-digesting proteins available - much slower than whey protein and whey protein isolate. Nitro Tech Casein Gold delivers 24 grams of high-quality casein protein taken from multiple premium casein sources for a prolonged amino acid release to feed your muscles for up to 8 hours. What's more, each enhanced serving of Nitro Tech Casein Gold contains 10 grams of naturally occurring BCAAs, L-glutamine and precursor, and only 1 gram of sugar. Directions: Ideal use is nighttime and between major meals. Mix 1 serving (1 scoop) with 8 to 10 oz. of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. For best results, mix 2 servings (2 scoops) with 16 to 20 oz. of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. Read the entire label before use and follow directions provided.
feature_bullets: Nitro Tech Casein Gold is superior to other casein protein powders - more protein per scoop, fewer carbs and more servings
Delivers 24g of high-quality protein taken from multiple premium casein protein sources
Smooth, great-tasting protein powder that doesn't pack the extra sugar and carbs you'll see in other whey protein and casein protein powders.
Features 10 grams of BCAAS, L-Glutamine and precursors

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
